title: Javascriptorium - first public release for Mac & PC
content:
An invitation to run [Javascriptorium](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714164331/http:/chronotext.org/scriptorium), a real-time 3D animation originally created for the Shrine of the Book, home of the Dead-Sea Scrolls.

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714164331im_/http:/chronotext.org/scriptorium/img/scriptorium_600_1_2_A_HE.png)

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714164331im_/http:/chronotext.org/scriptorium/img/scriptorium_600_3_1_A_EN.png)

[Windows](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714164331/http:/commondatastorage.googleapis.com/chronotext%2Fscriptorium_win.zip) (21.7MB)  
 [OSX](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714164331/http:/commondatastorage.googleapis.com/chronotext%2Fscriptorium_osx.zip) (23.7MB)

Stay tuned, as the code should be soon released as open-source...

Ariel  
 [http://chronotext.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714164331/http:/chronotext.org/)
